appendix.title: Additional Software for &s4sa;
appendix.para: &s4s; makes it easy to install software that is not included with your subscription:

listitem.para: Extensions and modules allow installing additional software created and supported by &suse;. For more information about extensions and modules, see &deploy;, Part Initial System Configuration, Chapter Installing Modules, Extensions, and Third Party Add-On Products at &docaddress;.
SUSE Connect Program allows installing packages created and supported by third parties, specifically for &s4sa;. It also gives easy access to third-party trainings and support. See .
&suse; Package Hub allows installation of packages created by &sle; community without support. See .

sect1.title: SUSE Connect Program
sect1.para: Start SUSE Connect Program from the &yast; control center using SUSE Connect Program. Choose from the available options. To enable a software repository, click Add repository.
All software enabled by SUSE Connect Program originates from third parties. For support, contact the vendor in question. &suse; does not provide support for these offerings.

note.title: SUSEConnect command-line tool
note.para: The SUSEConnect command-line tool is a separate tool with a different purpose: It allows you to register installations of &suse; products.

sect1.title: &suse; Package Hub
sect1.para:
To enable &suse; Package Hub, add the repository at
using either Zypper or the &yast; module Software Repositories.
Packages from &suse; Package Hub are created by the community and come without support. The selection includes, for example:

listitem.para: Packages for the R programming language
Packages for the Haskell programming language
